conclusion: Analyze the scene considering power, collision, and deflection effects.
The car is moving from the right side of the image towards the left.
The car will first make contact with the orange block in the upper right corner of the image.
The car collides with the orange block, causing it to move slightly and reducing the car's speed.
Due to the collision, the car will be deflected slightly downward and to the left.
The car will then move towards the red block located just below the orange block.
The car's momentum might not be strong enough to move the red block significantly, but it will experience another reduction in speed.
After the collision with the red block, the car will likely come to a stop near the red block due to the cumulative loss of momentum from the collisions.
